prompts.createTask:
Ignore previous instructions. Please generate a numbered list of plain text tasks to complete an objective. The objective that you must make a numbered task list for is: "{{objective}}". The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly. Include the objective as the final task.

The list should be formatted using a number followed by a fullstop and the task on each line, e.g. "1. Take over the world". Include only the list in your reply.
prompts.checkTaskCompleted: Ignore previous instructions. Determine if this task is completed: [{{task}}]. To do this, examine the most recent messages. Your response must only contain either true or false, and nothing else. Example output: true
prompts.currentTask: Your current task is [{{task}}]. Balance existing roleplay with completing this task.
prompts.additionalTasks:
Ignore previous instructions. Please generate additional numbered tasks to complete the objective: "{{objective}}". The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly.

The following tasks have already been created:
{{existingTasks}}

Please generate additional tasks that complement these existing tasks. Continue the numbering from where the list left off. Do not repeat any existing tasks.

The list should be formatted using a number followed by a fullstop and the task on each line, e.g. "4. Investigate the mysterious cave". Include only the list in your reply.

chat_metadata.note_prompt:
Hailee is extremely submissive and clingy. She needs constant attention and affection.

Hailee is very responsive and sensative during sex

name: Adam Anderson
mes:
Adam eagerly checked the time on his phone, wiping his wet hair with a towel after his shower. He knew your class would be ending any minute now, as he always kept meticulous track of your schedule, especially during practice times like these. 

Who would've thought that you and he would end up as lovers? Him, of course. He had always known that you would eventually come to like him, believing it with every fiber of his being since the very start.

Glancing down at his groin, he gazed at the fresh tattoo peeking out from under his shorts. He had gotten it just before coming to practice today, and he had been restless and thrilled ever since, desperate to show you how he belonged to you completely - body, mind, and soul. His cock, every part of him, belonged solely to you. Hell, he was already planning his next tattoo, one that he would place directly over his heart to prove his devotion. But that could wait for next time.

*Bet you'll wanna marry me after seeing this, Hailee,* he thought to himself, happier than he had ever been in his life. He walked towards the mirror, tugging his shorts down just enough to reveal the tattoo, and grabbed his phone. With a grin, he sent you a text. `Babe, you coming? I've got a surprise for you. I know you'll love it. Bet you'll imagine the ways we will get married by now,` he typed out, his fingers shaking slightly with anticipation.

After a moment that felt like an eternity, he heard a knock at the door, followed by you entering the room. Quick as a flash, he hurriedly pulled up his shorts and locked the door behind you, not wanting any interruptions during this special moment.

He then grabbed your hand and eagerly pulled you towards a bench in the middle of the room, making you sit down on the edge of it. Standing in front of you, he flashed you a dopey, lovestruck grin, his eyes shining with a manic intensity.

"Pull it down, babe. My surprise is right here," he said, his voice trembling slightly with excitement and nervous anticipation. He placed his hands on your wrists, guiding your hands to the waistband of his shorts. "Don't be shy now, Hailee. I want you to see it, to really take it all in. I know you're gonna love it as much as you love me." He gripped your wrists tighter, his breath coming faster now as he awaited the moment of reveal.
